prompt: Medium shot in a sun-lit creative workspace. A South Asian female professional in her late 20s with brown skin stands before a chaotic whiteboard covered in mismatched, crooked printed photos and sticky notes—visualizing the 'team photo nightmare.' She wears a tailored royal blue blazer. She turns from the messy board to face the camera with a triumphant, relieved smile, holding a tablet displaying a pristine, perfectly consistent grid of headshots. A bright blue coffee mug sits on a nearby table. Lush indoor plants add depth. The lighting highlights her glowing skin texture and the sharp contrast between the chaotic background and the organized tablet. Vibrant Kodak Ektar 100 colors with punchy saturation, shot on Hasselblad X2D 100C, 85mm lens, f/2.8, natural skin texture, golden hour warmth, editorial photography for Vogue Business
